description:
Hajime`s little brother is an otaku, and a best-selling BL doujinshi otokonoko author to boot. How did this happen...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cela dépasse le sexe ou le sang. Montre-toi, fillarçon !
Seibetsu o Koe Chi o Koe De de yo Otoko no Musume
Surpass Gender and Blood. Come Forth, Otokonoko
性別を超え血を超え出でよ男の娘
